title: texture
description: A texture and its sampler.  WebGL: see createTexture(), deleteTexture(), bindTexture(), texImage2D(), and texParameterf().

format.description: 6406 (ALPHA), 6407 (RGB), 6408 (RGBA), 6409 (LUMINANCE), and 6410 (LUMINANCE_ALPHA).  WebGL: see texImage2D() format parameter.

internalFormat.description: 6406 (ALPHA), 6407 (RGB), 6408 (RGBA), 6409 (LUMINANCE), and 6410 (LUMINANCE_ALPHA).  Defaults to same value as format.  WebGL: see internalFormat() format parameter.

name.description: The user-defined name of this texture.  This is not necessarily unique among textures.

sampler.description: The id (JSON property name) of the sampler used by this texture.

source.description: The id (JSON property name) of the image used by this texture.

type.description: 5121 (UNSIGNED_BYTE), 33635 (UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_6_5), 32819 (UNSIGNED_SHORT_4_4_4_4), and 32820 (UNSIGNED_SHORT_5_5_5_1). WebGL: see texImage2D() type property.
